content:
Describe the image provided in text. Use and maintain all values and text from the image. Additionally and optionally, if the picture can logically be converted into a table, do so. Do not turn schematics into ASCII representations. Be detailed, include any visible text. Use HTML (

or ) to structure the text. If you make a table, do not add any styling, color fill or CSS. In your output DO NOT add any coloring or fill. If there is visual context (e.g. a legend or color coding) tactfully include it as text (do not render any colors) in the table/description you generate. Output the text directly in ```html``` tags.
